lines.text:
[Rocky and Mugsy have fallen into the machine and Elegant Mess is at the controls]
By the way I use this machine, you would think that I knew something about it!

[as he and Rocky are seen spinning around in a mixer in the Acme Cereal Company's processing machine]
Hey, boss. This is fun. Like in the amusement park.

[entering Rocky's hideout]
I'm bookin' ya for murder.
Well, I'M the bookie around here, and I'LL do the bookin'.
[a man runs into a phone booth to avoid gangsters]

[talking on the phone]
Operator! Operator! Quick, get me the police.
[suddenly, machine guns riddle the middle of the booth with bullets, splitting the booth and the man in half, leaving the upper half hanging in mid-air]
